tool.name: fix arb fasta

param.label: -f/--input_fasta_fp: path to the input fasta file
param.name: input_fasta_fp

tool.help: This script fixes ARB FASTA formatting by repairing incorrect line break chararcters, stripping spaces and replacing "." with "-" characters. The reformatted sequences are written to stdout or to the file path provided with -o.
